message:
Thanks! It is very interesting topic. You wrote that:  
"The simple way to do this is to just toss the work into Task.Run. Unfortunately, ASP.NET has no idea if you have queued work like this, and it will feel free to take down your AppDomain when it thinks it's idle."  
Beside power loss, hurricanes, etc - what other realistic reasons that AppDomain will be killed during the job?
